name: The Secret Ingredient (Chipotle): Double-Pepper Red Hot Chipotle Slaw
description: This slaw is hot as it looks: with both fresh jalapeños and smoky chipotles.  Wrapped in warm corn tortillas, piled high on fish sandwiches, or just on the side, this dish makes plain old cole slaw seem pretty pathetic.
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons adobo, from the chipotle can
Freshly cracked black pepper to taste
6 thin scallions, finely sliced on the diagonal

recipeInstructions.text: In a very large bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, lime juice, chipotle peppers, adobo, sugar, salt, and pepper. Add the cabbage, scallions, jalapeño, and cilantro, and toss to combine. Either serve right away, or cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.
